static javax.xml.soap.SOAPFault getFault(javax.xml.soap.SOAPMessage soapMessage)
          This method returns the SOAP fault contained inside the SOAP message or returns null if it finds none.
static boolean isFaultMessage(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc)
          This method checks if the SOAP message in context contains a SOAP fault (true) or not (false).
static boolean isOutboundMessage(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc)
          This method checks if the SOAP message in context is going out of Web Service (outbound - true) or in (inbound - false).
static boolean isServerSideMessage(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc)
          This method checks if the SOAP message in context is being processed on the server-side (true) or on the client-side (false).
static void replaceBodyWithFault(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc, javax.xml.soap.SOAPFault soapFault)
          This method replaces the SOAP message's current body with a new SOAP Fault with the same contents as the given fault, including details
static void replaceBodyWithNewFault(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc, java.lang.String faultMessage)
          This method creates a new SOAP fault using the given fault message and replaces the SOAP message's current body with it
static void setOutboundMessage(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc, boolean outboundPropertyValue)
          This method changes the SOAP message context outbound property.
static javax.xml.namespace.QName suggestFaultCode(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc)
          This method analyses the SOAP message context and suggests the most appropriate Qualified Name for a SOAP fault that would be generated in it.

Method Detail

isOutboundMessage

public static boolean isOutboundMessage(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc)
This method checks if the SOAP message in context is going out of Web Service (outbound - true) or in (inbound - false).

setOutboundMessage

public static void setOutboundMessage(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc,
                                      boolean outboundPropertyValue)
This method changes the SOAP message context outbound property.

isServerSideMessage

public static boolean isServerSideMessage(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc)
This method checks if the SOAP message in context is being processed on the server-side (true) or on the client-side (false).

isFaultMessage

public static boolean isFaultMessage(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc)
                              throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
This method checks if the SOAP message in context contains a SOAP fault (true) or not (false).

Throws:
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException

suggestFaultCode

public static javax.xml.namespace.QName suggestFaultCode(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc)
                                                  throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
This method analyses the SOAP message context and suggests the most appropriate Qualified Name for a SOAP fault that would be generated in it.

It is aware of SOAP versions 1.1 and 1.2.

Throws:
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException

replaceBodyWithNewFault

public static void replaceBodyWithNewFault(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc,
                                           java.lang.String faultMessage)
                                    throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
This method creates a new SOAP fault using the given fault message and replaces the SOAP message's current body with it

Throws:
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException

replaceBodyWithFault

public static void replaceBodyWithFault(javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext smc,
                                        javax.xml.soap.SOAPFault soapFault)
                                 throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
This method replaces the SOAP message's current body with a new SOAP Fault with the same contents as the given fault, including details

Throws:
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException

getFault

public static javax.xml.soap.SOAPFault getFault(javax.xml.soap.SOAPMessage soapMessage)
                                         throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
This method returns the SOAP fault contained inside the SOAP message or returns null if it finds none.

Throws:
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
